author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify the hit analysis to make detailed comparison in the performance of Geant4 and GeantV using passive hits

#### PR validation:

Tested using private workflows on Geant and GeantV o/p

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-sim42 Modify the hit analysis class to make detailed comparison between G4 and GV
